experience.title: Hoveni
experience.description: Built a high-performance travel-tech platform with an SEO-optimized, mobile-ready booking workflow. Improved page load by 30% through code-splitting, lazy loading, and modular React architecture. Developed secure authentication (OAuth + JWT), designed low-latency backend APIs, and integrated GA4 with custom funnels and attribution tracking.
experience.technologies: React, TypeScript, Ionic, Capacitor, Redux, Golang, Docker, Git, GitLab, Figma

experience.title: ZeroToSuccess
experience.description: Architected SEO-ready pages for a content-heavy platform using react-helmet-async, Open Graph metadata, canonical URLs, and Twitter cards. Resolved major rendering and indexing issues in a Vite-based React setup to improve search crawler visibility. Built a complete blog system with optimized HTML rendering, loading states, and clean routing. Debugged and stabilized production deployments on Hostinger.
experience.technologies: React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, SEO, Web Performance, Hostinger

experience.title: PMI Bangalore Chapter
experience.description: Delivered a Job Portal & Blog platform with modular React architecture and pixel-accurate, responsive UI. Implemented secure role-based workflows for Users and Admins and built scalable backend APIs optimized for large datasets. Enhanced performance and UI consistency using Tailwind, custom hooks, and reusable components.
experience.technologies: React.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, REST APIs
